category-def.name: UI
category-def.label: 5. Salvo UI
category-def.description: The Salvo UI Feature. Contains Core.

category-def.name: Core
category-def.label: 2. Core
category-def.description: NNTP Core feature. Includes the model feature.

category-def.name: Filesystem_Store
category-def.label: 3. Filesystem Store
category-def.description: This store saves the read/unread articles in the local filesystem. It creates a lot of small files.

category-def.name: Derby_Store
category-def.label: 3. Derby Store
category-def.description: This store saves read/unread articles in a local derby database.

category-def.name: Everything
category-def.label: 1. Everything
category-def.description: This feature contains the NNTP components and the Salvo UI. It contains two stores so you have to decide which one you want to use by starting the required bundle.

category-def.name: quote_services
category-def.label: 6. Quote Services
category-def.description: The quote services add quotes to the end of a message. The services expose an OSGi service that is picked up by the UI. You can add your own implementation of the quote service.
